sentences.sContent: Such patients run an increased probability of hospitalization, with all the attendant costs to the patient and to the health care system that hospitalization entails.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such patients run an increased probability of hospitalization, with all the attendant costs to the patient and to the health care system that hospitalization entails.
sentences.sCn: 此类患者趋于住院治疗的的几率增加，随之而来的患者和医疗保健系统住院治疗所承担的费用也增加。

remMethod.val: 来自attend(vt. 出席； 护理)

words.tran: 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

trans.tranOther: relating to or caused by something
someone whose job is to look after or help customers in a public place
